talk_0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Thank you for driving away the intruders.
Those interlopers carried me here with
them from the Depths.<sp:0:4:0>I have no way of returning to where I was
stationed there. I will therefore continue
my work here.<sp:0:4:0>My task in the Depths was to manage
<clr:0000>schema stones<clr:ffff>. A great deal of zonaite
was mined and processed there once.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Notice_01>Please hold one moment.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>I have confirmed that there is a <clr:0000>schema
stone<clr:ffff> you do not yet have. <sp:5:0:0>Allow me to
rectify that.
talk_0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_01>Welcome.<sp:0:4:0>I <clr:0000>have something for you<clr:ffff>. But I do not
think you are ready to receive it.<sp:0:4:0>Please visit the <clr:0000>Great Abandoned Central
Mine<clr:ffff> in the Depths and return here after.
